abstract: Nuclear Regulatory Commission announces it is sending specialist to inspect Indian Point nuclear power plant in Buchanan, NY, following revelation of evidence of surge of radiation in groundwater near plant.

headline.print_headline: Federal Specialist to Inspect Elevated Radiation Levels at Indian Point Plant
headline.main: Federal Specialist to Inspect Elevated Radiation at Indian Point

snippet: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission is sending its specialist to join the investigation of radioactive groundwater at the power plant, about 45 miles north of Midtown Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission is sending its specialist to join the investigation of radioactive groundwater at the power plant, about 45 miles north of Midtown Manhattan.
